concept.title: Resolved Issues
concept.shortdesc: This section lists previous issues resolved by HPE Helion Eucalyptus 4.3.0.

row.entry: Issue
Description
Unified Logging request... was:jetty-request-2012_05_21.log found in /var/log/eucalyptus What is it for?
Some Euare NotAuthorized error messages are incorrect
Upgrade hardcodes eucalyptus (database) user
Jetty service appears in the list of public services
S3 IAM ARN wildcard causes ACL issues for bucket objects
After Syncing Large Number of LDAP Users, Timeout Occurs When Attempting to Delete Account
500 error that probably should be flagged as server error (5xx)
Role names should not be allowed to be longer than 64 characters
euca-describe-services with invalid service name hangs
physical core/memory overriding logic produces an incorrect warning
Remove Jetty / credential download
SignalResource support in cloudformation
eucanetd -f can spin forever in certain states
Running instance in non-existing SG throws InternalFailure
CreateRoute requires a mandatory internet gateway ID
Trying to delete a nonexistent access key results in 500s
Raise a clear error why actions cannot be performed due to migration in progress.
Wildcard value for 'account' resources in ARNs Are Not Supported
Use of region configuration file with only 'Regions' or misspelled 'Region' element returns vague error
Malformed 'CertificateFingerprintDigest' should return more descriptive error
EC2 response incorrect when Version parameter not present in request
VPC instances require access to user-api machines for DNS service
VPC - Max subnet cidr netmask should be limited to 16-28 bits.
Cloudformation: AWS::EC2::Image::Id not allowed as parameter type
MANAGED* Network Modes: NC Gate of instance run on network readiness
enhance error message: "Migrating instance i-ce0e95fd failed because of: ERROR"
ELB access logs collection fails when logs prefix contains an uppercase letter
clcadmin-initialize-cloud should print positive message on success
selinux check in eucalyptus-nc startup script is too strict
Instance manifest was changed after registration
DeleteKey Returns Odd Message When Deleting from Non-Native Region
Create default VPC if it does not exist before imaging stack creation
"snapshot creating" Logged messages need more context.
Authentication for users fails when password contains a semicolon
PROPERTY MGMT - www properties cleanup
eucanetd VPCMIDO - security group rules with ICMP type:code not implemented correctly
euca-authorize -t 1:65535 should not be permitted
NC fails to adopt instance in case of connect iscsi failure
VPC - eucanetd can use incorrect host-port when configuring router with multiple gateways
Admin tools that previously emitted deprecation warnings, including euca_conf and those beginning with "euca," have been removed
euca-authorize for ICMP/TCP/UDP protocol should throw exception about missing portRange
Metadata returns 404 for http://169.254.169.254/ on VPC
Cannot detach volume from migrated instance
Setting account address quota causes extra addresses to be allocated.
Availability Zones have a hard coded maximum of 2048 instances.
Updating ELB properties (keyname, emi, ..) does not update the autoscaling groups for existing ELBs
The deprecation warnings from commands beginning with "eureport" have been removed.
BundleInstance Fails From Remote Client on Federated HTTPS-enabled Setup
sensor memory allocation is incorrect in /util/sensor.c
elb dns name does not resolve
AWS Signature Version 4 url getting "Invalid credential (missing part)" error when using "query strings"
EC2 unknown instance not terminated
A server error occurred when calling the CopyObject operation
IAM region federation cannot administer accounts between regions
add ability to view scaling activity (history) to scaling group details page
Change of password for admin@eucalyptus results in internal server error when new password is less than 6 characters long
Bucket icons on buckets landing page are misplaced on IE
Start memcached to listen only on unix domain socket, not network
ELB security policy dialog doesn't reflect current policy
Include some page information in title for better browser history.
No error if Instance Name tag is used when Name field is blank
Check boxes on Create New User should be checked by default
Security groups not aligned when creating launch configuration from instance
JS Error in Launch Instance Wizard
"Select or type to enter account/user" on Bucket Details page does not inform user that ID is required for sharing with single account
ELB Wizard 'Next' button always appears enabled.
"!" in Error icon out of bounds in Windows/IE
CF invalid link after AWS template import
Console attempts to create ELB twice using IE11
Check mark and exclamation point are off centered on alert messages using IE11
In GUI, wrong message displayed for windows instance under connect to instance option.
Console throws 500 error when stopping an EBS-backed instance
Cannot find instance_id from the Elastic IP Detail page dialog box when instance is named
Duplicate 'Instance type' items shown on instance detail page when using EBS images
Stack description out of bounds in tile view on Stacks landing page
Missing field in Capacity area of Scaling Group Wizard General Tab
In "create stack" wizard cloud formation template does not activate the "next" button
Create Snapshot page shows detail page help as well as create help.
